questions.question: Which of the following is a valid way to iterate over a collection in JSTL?
Which JSTL tag library is used for SQL database operations?
What is the purpose of the <sql:query> tag in JSTL?
Which JSP tag is used to instantiate a JavaBean?
What is the default scope for a JavaBean created with <jsp:useBean>?
How to access the 'param' via EL in a JSP?
Which of the following scopes exists only for the duration of the request?
In JSP, which scope can be shared across multiple requests and sessions?
Which attribute is used to set a session scope for a bean in a JSP page?
Which tag should be used to set a property of a JavaBean in a JSP page?
Which of the following is a feature of JavaBeans?
What happens if you try to instantiate a bean that already exists in the same scope?
options: The JSP page throws an exception

questions.question: If you attempt to run a JSP that contains a coding error, the server typically returns an error page with HTTP Status _______.
Which of these represent the correct path for the core JSTL library?
What gets printed when the following expression is evaluated? ${(1==2) ? 4 : 5}
What gets printed when the following expression is evaluated? ${4 div 5}
What gets printed when the following expression is evaluated? ${12 % 4}
What is the output of the following JSP code? <c:set var="x" value="5"/><c:out value="${x * 2}"/>
When we create a custom Handler class for a custom Tag Library, which class should be extended?
To include HTML or JSP files within a JSP at runtime, you can use a/an ______ import tag.
What is the purpose of the <jsp:forward> tag in JSP?
options: To forward the request to another resource
To redirect the user to a new URL
questions.answer: To forward the request to another resource

questions.question: Which attribute in <sql:query> specifies the database connection?
Which attribute is used to specify the error page?
What happens when an uncaught exception is thrown in a JSP page with an errorPage directive?
options: The error page specified is displayed
The user is redirected to the homepage
questions.answer: The error page specified is displayed

questions.question: Which tag is used to handle exceptions in JSP?
To include a file in a JSP at compile-time, you can use the ______________ directive.
A/an ______________ is a special type of object that provides a standard way to access its properties.
Which JSTL SQL tag is used to update data in the database?
In which deployment descriptor element is a filter mapped to a servlet or URL pattern?
What does the FilterChain interface represent?
options: A single filter in the filter chain
The sequence of filters applied to a request/response
The container for all servlets in a web application
questions.answer: The sequence of filters applied to a request/response

questions.question: Which function in JSTL is used to trim leading and trailing whitespace from a string?
To replace occurrences of a substring within a string using JSTL, which function is used?
Assuming the standard JSTL prefix conventions are used, which JSTL tags would you use to iterate over a collection of objects?
What is the default value of the session attribute in the page directive?
Which of the following is the default contentType value in a JSP page?
What is the purpose of the <taglib> directive in a JSP page?
options: To declare the use of a custom tag library in the JSP page
To include a tag file in the JSP page
To forward a request to another JSP page
questions.answer: To declare the use of a custom tag library in the JSP page

questions.question: What does the body-content element specify in a TLD file?
options: The content type of the tag body
Whether the tag can have a body and what it contains
The URI of the tag library
The handler class for the custom tag
questions.answer: Whether the tag can have a body and what it contains

questions.question: In the MVC pattern, which component is responsible for handling user input?
Which method is used to send a redirect response to the client in a servlet?
Which JSP directive is used to include content from another resource (e.g., HTML, JSP) at page translation time?
What is the default buffer size in a JSP page?
Which of the following is a valid JSP directive?
Which tag is used to output a value in JSP without escaping special characters?
Which scope allows the data to be accessible for the entire application in JSP?
Which of the following is a valid declaration in JSP?
Which of the following is NOT a valid attribute of the page directive?
Which of the following is a correct example of a JSP expression?
In which order are the filters executed if multiple filters are configured for a servlet?
options: The order they appear in the web.xml
questions.answer: The order they appear in the web.xml

questions.question: Which of the following can be used to forward a request from one servlet to another?
Which tag in JSP is used to declare the file encoding?
